name: There's a monster under the bed
name_original: There's a monster under the bed
description:
Two brothers went to bed thinking it was a normal night... Then suddenly...

Controls

Movement : W A S D / Arrows

Attack / Use: LMB 

Potions :  1 

Key :  2

When selected a potion on a key you can't attack, remember that!

Core Team

Developer: João "Tek" Novo

Artist: Daniel "Apollo" Rocha
